name: Maglein
startIntroPart1: Your goal is to build the UN Station to win. Do anything you want that is necessary to achieve your utmost goal of this game
declaringWar: 'We stand united...ready and prepared to go to war in order to protect our citizens and uphold the values that built our great nation.'
defeated: 'War will be waged until our sovereignty is recognized and our territory is rightfully claimed.'
introduction: 'Oh, nice to meet you. Just passing through.'
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: My people stand with me in this struggle and will not rest until victory is ours.
tradeRequest: 'What do you say? Good deal, ain't it?'

name: Yodrea
declaringWar: 'Stand with me in this fight against the enemy.'
attacked: 'Let us rise and ready ourselves for a battle that we must win, for our futures depend on the outcome'
defeated: 'We resign ourselves to the mercy of the enemy and submit to their terms.'
introduction: Oh, hello. Don't attack me. I'm friendly and I am just passing through...
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Cynoc
startIntroPart2: Well, it looks like we found another. Hello, we come in peace.
declaringWar: Please don't resist. Make this easy for us. Nothing personal.
attacked: Are you sure you want to do this?
neutralNo: I'm afraid I would have to disagree.
Simply, I cannot agree with you.
hateLetsHearIt: Don't expect me to agree with you so easily, but continue.
hateYes: You'll have to do better than that, but I'll try and give you a chance.
afterPeace: Thank you, I'm glad you have ceased.
tradeRequest: We would like to trade. Would this barter be acceptable?

name: Rocros
startIntroPart2: Remember, no witnesses. I mean, hello, we come in peace!
declaringWar: 'We will vanquish our enemies and show them the true meaning of power.'
defeated: 'We will not rest until we have achieved total victory!'
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: 'We will fight until the last breath! We swore that we will turn things around in the future!'
tradeRequest: Got something that might interest ya!

name: Achesh
startIntroPart1: Your goal is to survive until 900 turns to win. Do anything you want that is necessary to achieve your utmost goal of this game
declaringWar: 'We must act with determination and resolve to safeguard our interests and protect our people.'
attacked: 'My people are ready, and I am determined to see this fight through until the end. '
defeated: 'For now, our cause is lost, and we must resign ourselves to our fate.'
introduction: Leave me alone and I'll let you be. I'm just passing through..
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: 'Let us look forward to better days.'
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Stington
startIntroPart1: Your goal is to max out five policies to win. Do anything you want that is necessary to achieve your utmost goal of this game
declaringWar: 'My people, stand with me, and together we will prevail!'
attacked: 'I have heard the call, and I am prepared to fight.'
defeated: 'Our honor has been tarnished, and our pride remains battered'
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: ' I now surrender myself to the enemy, in the hope that my surrender will prevent further bloodshed and bring peace to our lands.'

name: Lino
startIntroPart1: Your goal is to build the UN Station to win. Do anything you want that is necessary to achieve your utmost goal of this game
declaringWar: Together, we shall overthrow the evil rulers and reclaim our freedom.
attacked: Let us stand strong and fight back, and let our leaders know that we shall not waver in the face of adversity.
defeated: It wasn't supposed to end this way.
introduction: We hope to establish friendly relations with you, and work together for a better future.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
